drupalNodeEvent.title: Fighting against Mao with Words: The story of Lin Zhao

field_description.processed: In December 1960, the 29-year-old Beijing University student Lin Zhao was arrested in Shanghai, accused of having complotted against the state. The young woman will spend the last 8 years of her life in jail, but will never recognize the charges against her: for her, it was normal and necessary to criticize Mao and the Communist Party who were tyrannically governing the country. To fight against the regime, to find strengths to survive the terrible conditions of her incarceration, Lin Zhao had only one weapon: her writing talents.
